about_the_game:
CARDS GUNS ZOMBIES is a mixture of first-person arena shooter, horde defense, and deck builder (as the smartest of you may have already figured out from the title) in the comic sauce.

Open packs of cards, build your deck, slay zombies, save the citizens, and compete with others on the worldwide leaderboards. Then open some more, change the game with new additions to your collection, and REPEAT!


Like the thrill of opening a new pack of cards? Be our guest! Doing just that is one of the core mechanics of CARDS GUNS ZOMBIES.
Spend the in-game currency (no microtransactions!) to gain new cards varying from a simple medkit through infinite ammo mags to nukes and berserk modes.
Then create your deck by selecting:
  • Passive - working from start to finish, changing your game and your score multiplier - big heads, one-hit kills, high jumps, and many more...
  • Active - in the palm of your virtual hand accessible with the press of a button - explosive barrels, horn speakers, explosions, etc.
  • Weapons - from simple pistols, and sniper rifles to knives, bats, and katanas.
Thanks to the wide selection of cards every game can be different while taking place in the same area!


Even the greatest superhero would prefer to fight with hordes of zombies with the weapon in hand.
No worries, in CARDS GUNS ZOMBIES there is a whole arsenal to discover.
Starting from a simple pistol you'll quickly (depending on your skill and luck opening packs) grow your gun and melee weapon collection.
Close range or far away, loud and proud or silent and deadly - everyone can surely find something for them to place in the primary and secondary weapon slot.


Let's not forget why we are here - TO ERADICATE ZOMBIES! and maybe save some civilians in the process...
You'll get points for each of those things (and some more, depending on the chosen Passive cards) to contribute to your leaderboard standing.
But in order to cash in you'll need to be alive and leave the infection zone with all the saved civilians.
You die - you get nothing!
Gamble with your life, prolong your stay, get more points and cash, or leave sooner but in one piece - the choice is yours!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8/8.1/10/11 (x64 x86)
  • Processor: Quad Core Processor or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 760 2 GB or equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8/8.1/10/11 (x64 x86)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790k (AMD Ryzen 7 1700)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
